mapper.insert: insert into employee ( eno, dno, birth, email, name, photo, ppscode, job, phone, enabled, pwd, signtype, signpath, condition ) VALUES ( #{eno}, #{dno}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{name}, #{photo}, #{ppscode},#{job}, #{phone}, #{enabled}, #{pwd}, #{signtype}, #{signpath},#{condition})
mapper.update: update employee set dno = #{dno}, birth = #{birth}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, photo = #{photo}, ppscode = #{ppscode}, job = #{job}, phone = #{phone}, enabled = #{enabled}, pwd = #{pwd}, signtype = #{signtype}, signpath = #{signpath}, condition = #{condition}, WHERE eno = #{eno}
